participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, with a strong dedication to her work and family.
participant_1.background: I'm a woman. I work as a school teacher. I attend church every week. I enjoy gardening and walking outdoors. I have dogs.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Friendly and adaptable, always looking to make new connections and settle into his new environment.
participant_2.background: I work at a school. I already have stepchildren. I just moved into my first home. I recently moved to this country.
